{{Availability/Footer}}

The fishing spots Feebas is found in are randomly generated for [[Generation III]] and {{gen|IV}} games. In [[PokÃ©mon Ruby and Sapphire Versions|PokÃ©mon Ruby, Sapphire,]] [[PokÃ©mon Emerald Version|and Emerald]] they randomly change whenever the [[trend]] in [[Dewford Town]] changes. In [[Sinnoh]], they change every day.

{{Availability/Footer}}

In PokÃ©mon Emerald, the roaming PokÃ©mon is chosen in a sequence immediately after the credits where, after hearing a [[television]] report, the player is asked the color of the PokÃ©mon in it. If red is selected, Latias roams Hoenn and Latios is found at the island. If blue is selected, Latias is found at the island and Latios roams Hoenn.

In PokÃ©mon Emerald, the roaming PokÃ©mon is chosen in a sequence immediately after the credits where, after hearing a [[television]] report, the player is asked the color of the PokÃ©mon in it. If blue is selected Latios roams Hoenn and Latias is found at the island. If red is selected, Latios is found at the island and Latias roams Hoenn.

~Arceus!Game locations===

|}

{{Availability/Gen|gen=V}}
{{Availability/Entry2/None|v=Black|v2=White|area=[[PokÃ© Transfer]]}}
{{Availability/Entry2/None|v=Black 2|v2=White 2|area=[[PokÃ© Transfer]]}}
|}
|}
{{Availability/Gen|gen=VI}}
{{Availability/Entry2/None|v=X|v2=Y|area={{pkmn2|Event}}}}
{{Availability/Entry2/None|v=Omega Ruby|v2=Alpha Sapphire|area={{pkmn2|Event}}}}
|}
|}
{{Availability/Gen|gen=VII}}
{{Availability/Entry2/None|v=Sun|v2=Moon|area=[[Trade]]&lt;br>[[PokÃ©mon Bank]]}}
{{Availability/Entry2/None|v=Ultra Sun|v2=Ultra Moon|area={{pkmn2|Event}}}}
|}
|}
{{Availability/Footer}}

Arceus was originally intended to appear in {{game2|Diamond|Pearl|Platinum}} in the [[Hall of Origin]] when summoned using an [[event item]] called the [[Azure Flute]]. However, the Azure Flute was never distributed, although the text seen when receiving the 20th Anniversary Arceus states that Arceus could first be obtained in Diamond and Pearl in the Hall of Origin.
